p.s. hope the stacktrace gets not linebreaked

Created an attachment (id=8353)
stacktrace as export (without the ugly linebreaks)

sorry for the linebreaks

We can protect against the NPE, but it would be good to have a test case to 
see why this is happening. It looks like the image fails to retrieve its image 
data - but I do not know why that would happen.

I get it when switching to the "Threads and Monitors" view.
- Deadlock view: icons on the second and fourth level are big red squares (16x16)
- switched to Thread View: NPE + icons and labels in second level missing
- switched to Monitor View: icons in first level are little red squares (6x6),
icons in second level are scaled to 6x6

Note: bug 60850 is likely a dup of this.
*** Bug 60850 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
